comment: успех чека Лор Империум на обыск кровати

languages.text: Кусок матраса вырезан, и в образовавшейся нише устроен тайник.

traits.locale_text: Кусок матраса вырезан, и в образовавшейся ниже устроен тайник. Многие пустотоплаватели используют эту уловку.

languages.text: A piece of the mattress has been cut out to make a hiding place.
languages.original_text: Кусок матраса вырезан, и в образовавшейся нише устроен тайник.

traits.locale_text: A piece of the mattress has been cut out to make a hiding place.
A piece of the mattress has been cut out to make a hiding place.
A piece of the mattress has been cut out to make a hiding place.
A piece of the mattress has been cut out to make a hiding place.

languages.text: 床垫被切掉了一块，被改造成了临时的藏身之处。
languages.original_text: A piece of the mattress has been cut out to make a hiding place.

traits.locale_text: 床垫被切掉了一块，被改造成了临时的藏身之处。

languages.text: Un trozo de colchón ha sido cortado para crear un escondite.
languages.original_text: A piece of the mattress has been cut out to make a hiding place.

traits.locale_text: Un trozo de colchón ha sido cortado para crear un escondite.

languages.text: マットレスの一部を切り抜いて隠れ場所にしていたようだ。
languages.original_text: A piece of the mattress has been cut out to make a hiding place.

traits.locale_text: マットレスの一部を切り抜いて隠れ場所にしていたようだ。

languages.text: Ein Stück der Matratze wurde herausgeschnitten, um ein Versteck zu schaffen.
languages.original_text: A piece of the mattress has been cut out to make a hiding place.

traits.locale_text: Ein Stück der Matratze wurde herausgeschnitten, um ein Versteck zu schaffen.

languages.text: Un trou a été creusé dans le matelas pour faire office de cachette.
languages.original_text: A piece of the mattress has been cut out to make a hiding place.

traits.locale_text: Un trou a été creusé dans le matelas pour faire office de cachette.

languages.text: Yatağın bir kısmı kesilerek gizlenilebilecek bir yer yapılmış.
languages.original_text: A piece of the mattress has been cut out to make a hiding place.

traits.locale_text: Yatağın bir kısmı kesilerek gizlenilebilecek bir yer yapılmış.
